CONFERENCE.ConfDesc-1: Welcome to our conference room page! Our hotel offers state-of-the-art conference facilities for all your business needs. Whether you are planning a small meeting or a large corporate event, we have the perfect space for you.
CONFERENCE.ConfDesc-2: Our conference rooms are equipped with modern audio-visual equipment, high-speed internet access, and comfortable seating arrangements. The rooms are also fully air-conditioned to ensure a comfortable and productive environment for your attendees.
CONFERENCE.Name: Full Name/Company Name
CONFERENCE.CharReqName: Name should contain at least 2 characters
CONFERENCE.InvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
CONFERENCE.InvalidDate: Date can not be on the past
CONFERENCE.ReqNrOfAttenders: Fill in the number of participants
CONFERENCE.PatternReqNrOfAttenders: The allow values are only numbers
CONFERENCE.TimeSetError: Start time needs to be earlier than End Time
CONFERENCE.TimeError: Date and Time cannot be in the past

CONTACT-US.GetInTouchDesc: Want to get in touch? We'd love to hear from you. Here's how you can reach us.
CONTACT-US.Trecepdesc: Want to book a room? Just pick up the phone and get in contact with a receptionist
CONTACT-US.SupportDesc: Have any questions about our facilities? Send us an email and we’ll get back to you in no time
CONTACT-US.MessageDesc: We value our guests' feedback and are always happy to assist with any inquiries. We look forward to hearing from you and making your stay at our hotel a memorable one.
CONTACT-US.Name: Name
CONTACT-US.CharReqName: Name should be 2 or more character
CONTACT-US.MinCharMess: Message should be at least 10 character
CONTACT-US.MaxCharMess: Message should be less than 1500 characters

HOME.WelDesc:
Welcome to Aragosta Hotel & Restaurant
Established in 1995, our mission is to provide guests with a harmonious retreat where the beauty of nature and the comforts of modern hospitality converge. As a front beach, sea view retreat, we are committed to preserving and protecting the natural environment that surrounds Durrës beach, while offering unparalleled experiences that nurture the mind, body, and spirit. This includes promoting visits to the rich archaeological sites in Durrës city. Through sustainable practices, immersive activities, and genuine hospitality, we aim to create lasting memories and inspire a deeper connection with the natural and historical world.

We strive to be recognized as a leader in sustainable luxury hospitality in Albania. We aspire to set new standards for eco-conscious tourism, demonstrating that responsible stewardship of the environment can coexist harmoniously with exceptional guest experiences.
HOME.ConfDesc: Aragosta's conference room is perfect for productive meetings and collaborations. It features comfortable seating, AV technology, high-speed internet, and modern decor, accommodating up to 35 people.

RESTAURANT.Resdesc-1: Since 1995, savor the finest fish and Italian cuisine
RESTAURANT.Staffdesc: Our dedicated staff, with years of experience, ensures exceptional service and a warm, welcoming atmosphere. Passionate about culinary arts, they bring the best of fish and Italian cuisine to your table
RESTAURANT.Chefspecdesc: Our chef's specialty is the Linguine with Vongole, a classic Italian dish that is sure to delight your taste buds. This dish is a true testament to our chef's dedication to creating authentic and delicious cuisine. Don't miss the opportunity to try this signature dish at our restaurant.
RESTAURANT.CuisDesc: Aragosta Restaurant offers diverse dishes, focusing on fresh fish and authentic Italian cuisine, delighting Durres since 1995
RESTAURANT.Name: Name
RESTAURANT.CharReqName: Name should be 2 character or more
RESTAURANT.MaxCharReqName: Name should be less than 50 characters
RESTAURANT.LetterReqName: Name should contain only alphabetic characters and spaces
RESTAURANT.ValidReqEmail: Please enter a valid email address
RESTAURANT.PatternGuestErr: The allow values are only numbers
RESTAURANT.PastDateErr: Date can not be on the past
RESTAURANT.Date&TimeErr: Date and Time cannot be in the past
RESTAURANT.MaxCharMess: Message should be less than 1500 characters

AragDescfooter: ARAGOSTA is founded at 1995, with a long experience in accomodation, gastronomy field in fish and meat dishes, and lately with a Pizzeria.The 4 star hotel located in the most beautiful area of the ancient city of Durres.
